name: SpyCloud
description: The Polarity SpyCloud integration searches the SpyCloud API for Watchlist Asset Breach data for Domains, Email, and IPs.

options.name: SpyCloud API URL
options.description: The Spycloud API url used to search information about malicious indicators.

options.name: SpyCloud API Key
options.description: Spycloud API that can be found in the SpyCloud dashboard, under Main -> API

options.name: Max Concurrent Requests
options.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests. Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 20.

options.name: Minimum Time Between Lookups
options.description: Minimum amount of time in milliseconds between lookups. Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 100.
